content:
User: We’re super close to nailing this—let’s get it locked down!

Grok: Why do we need summaries at all? What's the value? We're not trying to summarize and these aren't even summaries, they're just the first 200 words, which are already contained. I think actual summaries will add value when we're querying the database, but not now, just bloat unless I'm missing something. Some examples of code blocks from your transcript. This will likely adjust as well between transcripts, so should be a setting at the top like prompt identifiers if possible.Format Design: I create a structured format, such as:{
